front.title: Use of BIER IPv6 Encapsulation (BIERv6) for Multicast VPN in IPv6 networks

abstract.t: This draft defines the procedures and messages for using Bit Index Explicit Replication (BIER) for Multicast VPN Services in IPv6 networks using the BIER IPv6 encapsulation. It provides a migration path for Multicast VPN service using BIER MPLS encapsulation in MPLS networks to multicast VPN service using BIER IPv6 encapsulation (BIERv6) in IPv6 networks.
